title: BJTDLLX Modern LED Ceiling Lights Acrylic 8-Head Circle Ring Chandelier Flush Mount Lighting Fixture Lamp w/Remote Control & 3 Colors Light for Dining Room Bathroom Bedroom Livingroom Decor
features: 【Material】The lampshade is made of acrylic material, which is stable and does not fade. The aluminum frame is resistant to fading and scratches.

【Unique Design】The LED ceiling lamp has a two-layer design, which is more three-dimensional than other flat ceiling lamps; it has a modern shape with eight leaf-shaped rings, just like a flower on the ceiling.

【3 Color Light Adjustable】stepless dimming light mode and 3 color changes (white, warm color, neutral light), you can use the remote control to adjust different light colors to adapt to different environments.

【Remote Control】The remote control needs to be used for code matching. Press and hold the vertical line on A until the light flashes, that is, the code is successfully matched, and the remote control is ready.

【Application】Suitable for interior decoration of bars, salons, kitchens, lofts, study rooms, home furnishings, children's rooms, hotel rooms, bathrooms, restaurants, bedrooms, halls, offices, corridors, hallways, stairs, halls, villas, etc.
description: Material: Iron base and Acrylic lampshade
Light color: White light, Warm light, Neutral light
